About Dental Image

Building confidence through exceptional dental care since 1994

Our Story

For over 30 years, Dental Image Therapy Centres has been a cornerstone of dental health in Winnipeg. What started as a single practice with a vision to provide comprehensive, compassionate dental care has grown into two state-of-the-art facilities serving thousands of families across the city.

Our name, "Dental Image," reflects our commitment to helping patients achieve the smile they envision. "Therapy Centres" emphasizes our holistic approach to dental health – we don't just treat teeth, we care for people. This philosophy has guided us through three decades of service and continues to drive us today.

Our Mission

To provide exceptional dental care in a comfortable, modern environment while building lasting relationships with our patients based on trust, education, and mutual respect.

Our Core Values

Compassion

Treating every patient with kindness, empathy, and understanding

Innovation

Embracing the latest technology and techniques in dentistry

Community

Building lasting relationships with patients and giving back

Excellence

Committed to the highest standards in everything we do

Leadership Team

Dr. Patrick McManus

Owner & Lead Dentist - St. Vital

University of Manitoba graduate and part-time clinical instructor. With over 25 years of experience, Dr. McManus leads our St. Vital location with a commitment to patient-centered care.

Dr. Donald Dziewit

Co-Owner - Garden City

Winnipeg native and University of Manitoba 1994 graduate. In practice since 1998, partner since 2007, bringing innovation and expertise to our Garden City location.

Dr. Linda Simpson

Co-Owner - Garden City

Miami, MB native and University of Manitoba 2002 graduate. Pacific Training Institute graduate, partner since 2007, specializing in family dentistry with compassionate care.
